item.title: 【Cinema Center】MOVIE - Weathering With You/Tenki No Ko (2019) [HEVC x265 | Dolby Vision Profile 7 + HDR10 | DTS-HD Master | JAP 5.1/2.0]
item.description:
Synopsis:​
Hodaka, a young high school student, fled his island to Tokyo. Without money or employment, he tries to survive in the urban jungle and finds a post in a magazine dedicated to the paranormal.
